title: SA-TIED Geospatial Workshop
text:
Welcome to the workbook for the SA-TIED Geospatial Workshop. Over the course of this two-day introductory workshop, you will be introduced to the R programming language, make some thematic maps, and conduct some spatial data analysis. We will explore the following topics:

Fundamentals of using R for data analysis
Creating basic maps using R
Quantifying the degree of spatial dependence in a dataset
Incorporating space into statistical models




The schedule of this workshop is as follows:

This workbook is created using the Quarto publishing system. The workbook’s content is partially based on:

The GEOG0030: Geocomputation 2023-2024 workbook by Justin van Dijk
The Mapping and Modelling Geographic Data in R course by Richard Harris
